slide-1.title: Head & Tail
content: Head & Tail is a game where you predict the result of 3 coin combinations dropped by the dealer. Each coin has 2 sides, Head (red dragon logo) and Tail (blue tiger logo).

slide-2.title: How to Play
content: You can bet on the result of each coin, coin combinations, combined coin combinations, or bet on the side that appears the most.

slide-3.title: How to Win
content: 3 coins will drop and form a combination. Bets that match the result will win.
